business.headline: Dr Reddy's asks several top-paid executives to quit in cost-cutting drive: ReportDr Reddy's Laboratories (DRL) FY24 annual report shows it had over 26,000 employees worldwide as of March 2024. That includes 21,757 permanent staff. In FY24, the company hired 6,281 people and spent Rs 5,030 crore on employee benefits,

Over 40? You might be first in line for layoff, says Bombay Shaving Company CEOProfessionals in their 40s, once seen as reliable, experienced and ready for leadership roles, are now being hit hard by layoffs.

Tycoons in turmoil: Indian billionaires caught in Trump's tariff stormThe net worth of Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Shiv Nadar, and others has taken a massive hit amid a sharp correction in equity markets, fuelled by foreign investor exits and escalating global trade friction. All thanks to US President Donald Trump's tariff shock.

Rs 2.25 crore lumpsum or Rs 84k monthly? Which pension plan should you opt forUnder UPS, the government puts in 10% of your basic salary and dearness allowance and adds another 8.5% to your pension pot. On the other hand, under NPS, the government contributes 14% of your salary.

BluSmart likely to end cab service, join hands with Uber: ReportThe company, which started out by operating electric vehicles on Uber's platform nearly six years ago, is now preparing to shut down its own cab service and supply cars to Uber again.

Investing or borrowing? Check new SBI, HDFC, BOI interest ratesThe latest rate cut signals a broader trend—savers are using savings accounts mainly for transactions, while putting the rest in fixed deposits for better returns.

Mehul Choksi arrested in Belgium: What is the Rs 14,000-crore PNB scam?Mehul Choksi once headed the Gitanjali Group, a well-known jewellery firm. Born in 1959, Choksi was active in the diamond industry for many years.

Bank of India cuts home loan rates for new, existing customers. Check detailsThis adjustment is expected to make borrowing slightly easier for individuals at a time when the RBI is clearly looking to revive private investment and sustain domestic demand.

What to expect from stock market this week? 4 key things investors should knowMultiple factors could determine the mood on Dalal Street. From April 12 to 19, investors will be watching crucial Q4 earnings, economic data releases in India, the US, and China.
Investor visits Mumbai slum, uncovers truth about 'Make in India'Veteran investor Shankar Sharma recently shared a personal experience that raised fresh questions about India's manufacturing reality.

'Shift to UAE': Kotak AMC MD Nilesh Shah flags tax loophole exploited by NRIsNilesh Shah has warned that high-net-worth individuals could exploit tax treaties with some countries to avoid India's capital gains tax.

RBI may pay record Rs 2.5 lakh crore dividend to centre in FY25The RBI is likely to announce the exact dividend amount in late May. Last year, the payout surprised many as it was double what most had expected.

Ambedkar Jayanti 2025: Is the stock market closed today?Over the past few months, benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty have seen large ups and downs, with global news, especially from the United States, playing a major role in the market's movement.

Tariff war may benefit India despite short-term shocks: Mercedes-Benz India CEOMercedes-Benz India CEO Santosh Iyer stated that India may benefit from the ongoing global tariff war in the long term despite short-term challenges. He highlights the potential for increased trade and reduced barriers as a positive outcome for India.

Why is Apple in a race against time to fly iPhones back to the US?Apple's long-term goal is to reduce its dependence on Chinese factories and shift more production to other countries, with India playing a big part in that plan.  However, it relies heavily on a network of suppliers and trained workers that only exists at the required scale in parts of Asia.

RBI launches WhatsApp Channel: Here's how to access it via QR codeThe RBI said that the goal of the WhatsApp channel is to provide verified and timely information about banking, digital safety, and other important topics directly to users.

Pentagon cuts $5.1 billion contracts with Accenture, Deloitte: Wasteful spendingThe contracts appeared to be wide-ranging cuts to consulting services for the Navy, the Air Force, the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) and the Defense Health Agency.

Wall Street bounces back after wild week fueled by tariff warAll three major US indexes ended the session sharply higher after assurances from Boston Federal Reserve President Susan Collins that the Fed is prepared to keep financial markets functioning should the need arise.

India pushing for trade deals with US, EU with high urgency: JaishankarOn Wednesday, Trump announced a 90-day pause on his sweeping tariffs on all countries, except China as countries around the world wilted under the impact of the seismic action.

How Trump tariffs could make iPhones, cars, and clothes costlier in the USTrump's latest plan includes a massive 145% tax on goods coming from China. Experts say this could end the long run of cheap, imported goods that Americans have enjoyed for decades.
Sensex ends 1,300 points higher, Nifty above 22,500; Tata Steel up 5%The S&P BSE Sensex jumped 1,310.11 points to close at 75,157.26, while the NSE Nifty50 added 429.40 points to end at 22,828.55.

Mutual fund SIP vs PPF: What Rs 1 lakh a year can earn in 15 yearsPPF is a government scheme with a current interest rate of around 7.1% per annum. On the other hand, SIPs typically offer higher interest when invested over the long term, especially in equity mutual funds. But they carry some risk, as returns depend on the market.

Explained: Why Muthoot Finance shares fell over 8% todayMuthoot Finance stock price: Muthoot Finance, one of India's largest gold loan companies, has seen its share price decline by 14% in the past five trading sessions. The stock is also down 7% over the past month.

Mutual fund inflows hit in March. Trump tariffs to blame?The largest outflows were seen in debt mutual funds, where investors pulled out Rs 2.02 lakh crore, possibly due to end-of-year financial needs by institutions and ongoing global uncertainty.

Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath's money advice: 'No shortcuts to getting rich'Nithin Kamath shared a video with a powerful message—earning more doesn't mean you're saving more. In fact, higher income often leads to more spending on gadgets, clothes, dining out, or things meant just to impress others.

Trump tariffs, trade war fears could bring your loan EMIs down further this yearBorrowers could emerge as the unexpected winners if global headwinds linger and domestic growth slows further, with the RBI likely to step in again to lower the key interest rates.

Wall Street crashes, Dalal Street rallies: 5 things investors should knowStock market today: Dalal Street's leading indices rallied sharply, defying a global sell-off sparked by Wall Street's overnight crash. Here are the key factors behind today's stock market rally.

Mutual fund inflows fall for March by Rs 4,221 crore, shows AMFI dataEquity mutual fund inflows dropped by Rs 4,221 crore in March, falling to Rs 25,082 crore from Rs 29,303 crore in February 2025, as per data released by the Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI).

TCS shares fall after disappointing Q4. Check latest price targetsTCS share price: Despite a muted Q4, brokerages back TCS with revised targets, betting on deal wins, margin levers, and recovery prospects to drive medium-term gains.

Sensex jumps 1,400 points: 3 things to know about Dalal Street rallyShare market today: A surprise rally may have lit up the screens, but with volatility still lurking and trade risks unresolved, investors would do well to tread carefully through this temporary pocket of optimism.

Sensex up by 1,300 points, Nifty above 22,500 as markets cheer tariff pauseStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,353.59 points to 75,200.74, while the NSE Nifty 50 gained 443.70 points to 22,842.85 as of 9:43 am.

Stock market today: Will Sensex, Nifty open higher on 90-day pause on tariffs?Sensex, Nifty today: Early signs suggest a positive start. Gift Nifty futures were trading at 22,933.5 at 8:20 am, showing a 2.5% jump from Nifty 50's Wednesday close of 22,399.15.

TCS to delay salary hike? Check what top management said after Q4 resultsTCS reported a net profit of Rs 12,224 crore for the fourth quarter of FY25. This is a 1.7% drop compared to Rs 12,434 crore reported in the same quarter last year.

Stocks to watch on April 11: TCS, Accenture, Deloitte, Tata Steel, BHELKey stocks to watch in today's trade include shares of TCS, Accenture, Deloitte, Tata Steel, BHEL Sun Pharma, Bharti Hexacom due to various news developments and third quarter results.

China tops FDI Confidence Index for third consecutive year, India slips to 5thChina has reaffirmed its position as one of the world's leading FDI hubs in the top 10 for four years and number one emerging market for three years. Despite global tensions, investors remain optimistic, with India ranking 5th among emerging markets in 2025.

US stocks dive as euphoria on Wall Street reverts to fear about US-China trade warUS stocks declined on Thursday after making historic gains a day earlier amid tensions between Washington and Beijing over tariffs.

Trump's 26% additional tariffs on India suspended till July 9: White HouseOn April 2, US President Donald Trump slapped universal duties on about 60 countries exporting goods to America and additional steep levies on countries like India.

Will Dalal Street cash in on Trump's 90-day tariff timeout?The US President's unexpected decision to announce a 90-day pause on reciprocal tariffs—with China being the notable exception—has reignited global risk appetite.

Italy's Prada agrees to buy fashion rival Versace in nearly $1.4 billion dealThe price Prada has agreed to pay for Versace is a big discount to the roughly USD 2.15 billion including debt that Capri paid for Versace in 2018.

TCS Q4 Results: Profit falls 2% to Rs 12,224 crore, final dividend at Rs 30TCS ends FY25 with strong deal wins but earnings miss estimates, capping a tough year for the IT giant as macro headwinds and weak discretionary spending weigh on profit growth.

entertainment.headline: People feel threatened: Randeep Hooda after Bollywood ignored his role in ExtractionBollywood actor Randeep Hooda opened up about the lack of appreciation from the Hindi film industry for his role in the Hollywood film 'Extraction'. Despite his substantial screen time alongside Chris Hemsworth, Hooda's work was largely ignored by Bollywood, but he found recognition among South Indian filmmakers.

Kesari 2: Akshay Kumar, R Madhavan visit Golden Temple ahead of film's releaseThe cast of Kesari 2, including Akshay Kumar, Ananya Panday, and R Madhavan, visited the Golden Temple in Amritsar for blessings ahead of the film's release. The movie, based on true events, explored the aftermath of the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

Suniel Shetty's note about granddaughter, slow living, and real joy melts heartsActor Suniel Shetty said he has found real joy in his granddaughter. He wrote a long note about how the feeling of carrying his granddaughter in his arms is unparalleled and has provided new meaning to his life.
Veteran Kannada actor Bank Janardhan dies at 75Kannada film and television actor Bank Janardhan died at the age of 75 due to age-related health issues.

Fear patriarchy, not paranormal: Nushrratt Bharuccha's Chhorii 2 is a wake-up callNushrratt Bharuccha's 'Chhorii 2' highlights the brutal side of Indian society, where the preference for having a male child and the growing cases of female foeticide have added to the ongoing debates about deep-rooted patriarchy, gender-based violence, and the societal failure to value the girl child.

Who is Kerianne Flynn, producer travelling with Katy Perry to space?Producer Kerianne Flynn, who has bankrolled several acclaimed projects, including 'The Automatic Hate' (2015), 'This Changes Everything', and more, is among the six women preparing to launch into space on a Blue Origin rocket.

Randeep Hooda questions Ranbir's role in Highway promotions while he was left outRanbir Kapoor once promoted 'Highway' with Alia Bhatt and Imtiaz Ali, while the film's lead actor, Randeep Hooda, was kept out of promotions. Now, the latter asked what Ranbir had to do with the film.

HIT 3 Trailer: Nani's Arjun Sarkaar restores faith in humanity in gritty thrillerThe much-awaited trailer of HIT 3 is out. Starring Nani as the fierce cop Arjun Sarkaar, the action-thriller will release in theatres on May 1.

Big B asks fans how to grow his X followers, internet responds with hilarious ideasAmitabh Bachchan shared a post on X asking fans how he could grow his follower count. The internet responded with hilarious suggestions, including posting a selfie with actor Rekha, among others.

Ibrahim Ali Khan's red jacket look in Swiss pics screams Saif's Ta Ra Rum Pum vibesIbrahim Ali Khan once again gave his fans the like-father-like-son moment when he shared new photos of himself wearing a red jacket during his Switzerland trip.

Bold and thought-provoking: Kareena confirms Daayra with Meghna Gulzar, PrithvirajActors Kareena Kapoor and Prithviraj Sukumaran are set to share the screen space for the first time in Meghna Gulzar's crime drama, 'Daayra.'

More of Hrithik, Saba, and little Malti in Priyanka's April photo-dump 'so far'Actor Priyanka Chopra on Monday gave a glimpse into her 'April so far'. She shared a new photo from her outing with Krrish co-star Hrithik Roshan and his partner, Saba Azad.

End hate: Apoorva Mukhija stands by friend Rida Tharana over black magic commentApoorva Mukhija has spoken out following criticism directed at Rida Tharana over her remarks on black magic. She calls for an end to spreading negativity.

Sunita Ahuja's 'zip it' reaction to paparazzi asking about Govinda. WatchGovinda and his wife, Sunita Ahuja, faced divorce rumours earlier this year. Now, her reaction to paps asking about her husband's absence from an event has gone viral in a new video.

Samantha says same role, same days, but paid 'dramatically different' than menActor Samantha opened up about the significant pay gap between her and her male counterparts in the Telugu film industry. She advocated for equal pay for equal work.

Jaat box office Day 4: Sunny Deol's film misses Rs 50 crore mark in 1st weekend Sunny Deol's 'Jaat' collected around Rs 40 crore nett in India after its extended opening weekend. The film showed impressive growth on its first Sunday, which is a good sign for its future run domestically.

Pawan Kalyan's wife Anna offers hair at Tirumala after son survives fire accidentActor-politician Pawan Kalyan's wife Anna Lezhneva tonsured her head after their son, Mark Shankar, survived the fire accident at his school in Singapore. Anna vowed her hair to Lord Venkateshwara at the Tirumala Tirupati temple.

Good Bad Ugly box office Day 4: Ajith's film to top Dragon soon, nears Rs 100 croreAjith's 'Good Bad Ugly' is moving at a decent pace. While it is yet to surpass the benchmark of Rs 100 crore domestically, the film has already managed to cross that mark worldwide.

The Last of Us 2 Episode 1 review: Pedro Pascal show hits the sweet spotReleased-Mon Apr 14, 2025The pilot episode of HBO's highly-anticipated The Last of Us Season 2 is here, and it is safe to say that the audiences are in for an exhilarating ride. Once again. Read our complete take on the first episode here.

general news.headline: Mehul Choksi's extradition requested, Indian officials to travel to BelgiumThe Belgian authorities are preparing for further legal proceedings that Choksi will be facing, while legal counsel will be provided for him as well.

Centre might take fight back to SC as ruling curtails President's powerThe Centre is likely to file a petition in the Supreme Court, seeking a review of the apex court's ruling in the Tamil Nadu case. The landmark judgment, which set a deadline for the Executive to clear Bills, also curtailed the President's absolute veto powers.

Woman stripped off hijab, Hindu man beaten in UP's Muzaffarnagar; 6 arrestedThe men in the video are seen forcibly removing the woman's hijab, while verbally abusing, harassing, and physically assaulting her and the man who accompanied her.

Punjab-born surgeon killed in US chopper crash; husband was the pilotPunjab-born surgeon Joy Saini and five of her family were killed in a plane crash in New York. The aircraft was piloted by her husband, Michael Groff, and crashed just 16km short of its destination. Saini had moved to the US as a child with her parents.

Tycoons in turmoil: Indian billionaires caught in Trump's tariff stormThe net worth of Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Shiv Nadar, and others has taken a massive hit amid a sharp correction in equity markets, fuelled by foreign investor exits and escalating global trade friction. All thanks to US President Donald Trump's tariff shock.

Why Interpol dropped Mehul Choksi's Red Notice and what his arrest means for IndiaWith Mehul Choksi's detention in Belgium, the focus will now shift to the extradition process, which could take time depending on legal proceedings there. However, Indian authorities are hopeful that this arrest will lead to a breakthrough in the long-drawn case involving one of India's most high-profile fugitives.

PM's 'votebank ka virus' jibe at Congress draws 'lip service to Ambedkar' counterWhile speaking at an event in Haryana, PM Modi claimed that Congress never used the Constitution to benefit anyone, including the Muslims, Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes, and Other Backward Classes.

How India foiled Mehul Choksi's plan to flee to SwitzerlandMehul Choksi, who fled India in 2018 before his involvement in PNB scam case came to light, was arrested by Belgium authorities at India's request.

UP men accused of manhandling woman seen limping post-arrest: 'Oscar-worthy act'A group of six men were accused of stripping off a woman's hijab and assaulting a Hindu man accompanying her in Uttar Pradesh's Muzaffarnagar.

Video: Fire at Hyderabad hotel where Sunrisers Hyderabad team was stayingA fire broke out at the Park Hyatt in Banjara Hills, just as Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) players were leaving the hotel premises. The blaze was swiftly extinguished, and no casualties were reported.
White House shares pic of Elon Musk with son X holding UFC championship beltThe White House shared a picture of Tesla CEO Elon Musk and his son Æ A-Xii in a post on X.

Trump's new immigration rules bring more bad news for IndiansThe EB-5 Unreserved category for Indian applicants has retrogressed by over six months - from November 1, 2019, to May 1, 2019 - narrowing the eligibility window and significantly delaying the path to US permanent residency.

Here's the story of Mehreen and her incredible experience through the treacherous snow-laden terrain, in one of the most difficult roads in the world.

Mehul Choksi's downfall: From Dubai towers to Rs 6,000 crore bank scam trailThe Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) and the Enforcement Directorate (ED) accused Mehul Choksi of masterminding a Rs 6,097.63 crore fraud in collusion with officials of Punjab National Bank (PNB).

CCTV shows man kidnapping girl before killing her in Karnataka's HubballiThe chilling CCTV footage captured the moment a man abducted a five-year-old girl in Hubballi, Karnataka, ultimately leading to her murder. The accused was later killed in an encounter with the police.

Who is Ayush Mhatre? CSK set to sign 17-year-old who idolises Rohit SharmaIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings are all set to confirm the signing of 17-year-old Mumbai opener, Ayush Mhatre as a replacement for Ruturaj Gaikwad. Ayush idolises Rohit Sharma and has several strokes in his arsenal that mirror his cricketing hero.
How Katy Perry and Lauren Sanchez are taking fashion to spaceIf space is the new frontier, then these women just turned the launchpad into a runway.

Choksi's wallet is full, he will do what Vijay Mallya did, warns whistleblowerIn what could provide a boost to India's fight against fugitive economic offenders, diamond trader Mehul Choksi has been arrested in Belgium. However, getting Choksi extradited could be a tough task, says PNB scam whistleblower Hariprasad SV. He says Choksi has the money to hire the best lawyers in Europe and frustrate India's efforts, like former liquor baron Vijay Mallya has.

NCERT gives Hindi names to English textbooks, sparks language rowThe NCERT has stirred debate by giving Hindi names to its new English-medium textbooks, including those meant for learning English. Experts and educators question the move, calling it confusing and a break from long-standing academic norms.

Porter agent calls customer lazy for tower-to-tower delivery, video sparks debateThe Porter delivery man, who documented the process in the video, turned the camera toward tower 17, from where he had to collect the order, and then pointed at tower 19 in the same apartment complex, where it needed to be delivered.

As India debates 90-hour weeks, Japan embraces 4-day work cultureAs countries around the world move towards shorter workweeks, Japan's new four-day work policy shows how work-life balance is becoming an important part of solving bigger problems like falling birth rates and an ageing population. While some voices in India call for longer hours, countries are prioritising their population.

Heatwave to grip Delhi, North India with high temperatures; storm alert in EastThe IMD has issued heatwave warnings for parts of Rajasthan, Punjab, Haryana, and Madhya Pradesh. West Rajasthan is expected to be the worst hit, with severe heatwave conditions predicted from April 16 to 18.

Mayank Yadav recovers from injury, set to join LSG after long layoffMayank Yadav, one of the fastest bowlers in the history of Indian cricket, has recovered from injury and is set to join the Lucknow Super Giants on Tuesday, April 15, India Today has learnt.

Make Rohit captain: Fan pleads with folded hands to Nita Ambani at Shirdi templeIPL 2025: A fan was seen requesting Mumbai Indians owner Nita Ambani to reinstate Rohit Sharma as captain during the latter's visit to Shirdi temple. Hardik Pandya replaced Rohit as MI captain in 2024.

Watch: Kylian Mbappe's red-card tackle on Alaves playerReal Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe was given a straight red card for his horror tackle against Alaves midfielder Antonio Blanco. After the match, assistant coach Davide Ancelotti defended Mbappe, stating that he was not a violent guy.

Despite Karun Nair's blazing 89, MI successfully defended 205 in Delhi on Sunday.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
